comment: I love this for half the price. Didn't find as simple as some of the ratings. Tons of gingerbread, green apple and toffee to keep me smiling well into a second glass.

This just sounded like such a gimmick, cashing in on the Mad Men craze and all. But, hey, looks are deceiving. This very light colored dram comes in a beautiful metal tin. It greets you with this apple oatmeal scent. It goes in fruity, touch of honey on oatcake. It's got a polite finish, doesn't linger. Love this. It's just an uncomplicated drink to end a complicated day.
Over-priced. If you want to take a trip back to the 60's, save yourself $100 and purchase a bottle of J&B.
Bien trop cher, whisky sympa sans plus

I was pleased and disapointed all at the same time. As the slogan says "This is your grandfather's whisky" I was expecting something so much more robust and oily. Something that could have built me a cabin after fishing. A very good whisky but I do believe this is Glennfiddich 12 masquerading around in a wolf costume.
I agree with the official notes, definitely pears, grain and lightly toasted nutts, but it lacks depth for me. Easy drinkable, but overpriced.
Light and simple, while remaining pleasant. An easy sipping Scotch that would benefit beginners, without being indulgent.
Kabaret inside Firekeepers Casino, July 28, 2018. A little bite, but satisfying. 12 year variety.
Smooth.  Great finish.  Not sure it is worth the price, but a nice Father’s Day gift with Dad.
Very smooth. I taste a nutty flavor, with limited sweetness. End of the drink has a pleasant saltiness to it, as if they had lined the rim. Very little backend burn, which surprised me. Good drink.

Very similar to the 12 Year. No obvious difference between the two, although I didn't compare them side by side. Not currently available in Ontario. It was over the holidays and I believe it was $100.
For those quiet Sundays in jorts and a straw hat gazing past the farm, simplistic
Mild floral aroma, nutty spice on palette, mild finish
Citrus on the nose, with mineral medicinal note. Like a flinstone vitamin. Earthy and organic, very light smoke. Strong acetone taste early, but dilutes well. extremely dry, low oil mouthfeel
A good Glenfiddich, not much alkohol taste and a bomb of notes
